author: lgray
body:
This is the preliminary version of the merged EM + hadron clustering.

Some final investigations concerning using the expected penetration depths of charged hadrons need to be done, for instance to help stop low energy tracks earlier in the calorimeter. This is very important for correct functioning of the clustering in high pileup.

This PR is meant to serve as a checkpoint of this work. 
There are a few things to follow up before we commit this for central production.

@pfs @vandreev11
title: HGC Clustering Checkpoint
